entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Showers beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
